I would drop this one as method name and parameters are self-explanatory enough.

nodes.bodyText: The Also, add a separate test for the default field delimiter should be extracted to separate commit.

I have just notice that it would be nicer to move this refactoring commit before "Add null format property to Hive textfile tables".
And then only add testCreateExternalTableWithNullFormat in new form.
Now we are adding testCreateExternalTableWithNullFormat and then refactoring it in followup commit.
It is nice to have. But not a must do.
